job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Who are we?

   is on a mission to provide global private market visibility. Our industry-leading platform combines advanced AI tech with local-for-local research. It delivers the highest quality information on the companies that matter to you most.

   We serve 100% of MBB/Big-4 advisories, clients representing >$500bn of private equity capital and more than 70% of the top-20 global M&A houses. Examples include Blackstone, Goldman Sachs and McKinsey. We lead the market on customer satisfaction, as validated by external research (User Evidence survey 2023).

   has been named as one of Europe's top 50 fastest growing businesses, operating globally with offices in Amsterdam, London, Frankfurt, Warsaw and Bangalore.

   The role

   The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

   Your experience
     * > 5 years of software development
     * > 3 years Go
     * Deep Go knowledge, familiar with best practices and standards
     * Experienced using PostgreSQL or similar SQL databases
     * Experienced deploying Go applications on cloud platforms
     * API and SaaS backend web app development
     * Data scraping, aggregation, processing, and ingestion
       Bonus if you have
     * Experience with Google Cloud Platform
     * Experience with Infrastructure as Code tooling, such as Terraform or Pulumi
     * Experience with data pipelines and large-scale data aggregation
     * Experience in FinTech, economics, or private equity
     * An interest in GenAI (we have shipped multiple features and have many more in the pipeline)
       What we offer
     * Working with excellent colleagues on a product that is loved by its customers
     * Flexibility and freedom
     * Modern stack
     * Excellent compensation
     * Equipment of your choice
     * Company-wide outings and events
     * Well-funded company that is healthy and fast-growing
       Does this sound like a perfect match?
       Don't hesitate. Apply now or reach out to our Head of Engineering, . Let's explore the potential for a perfect match!
       B.V. with its registered seat in Apollolaan 151, 1077 AR Amsterdam, The Netherlands, or another entity which runs the recruitment process, further called "", is the controller of personal data you submit as part of the job application. Your personal data will be processed for the purpose of conducting a recruitment process for the job position you apply for. If you provide with explicit consent, your personal data will be also processed for the purpose of conducting future recruitment processes. Please read the Privacy Policy to acquaint yourself with how processes your personal data: .
job_details.full_text:
Senior Software Engineer (Go)

Who are we?

   is on a mission to provide global private market visibility. Our industry-leading platform combines advanced AI tech with local-for-local research. It delivers the highest quality information on the companies that matter to you most.

   We serve 100% of MBB/Big-4 advisories, clients representing >$500bn of private equity capital and more than 70% of the top-20 global M&A houses. Examples include Blackstone, Goldman Sachs and McKinsey. We lead the market on customer satisfaction, as validated by external research (User Evidence survey 2023).

   has been named as one of Europe's top 50 fastest growing businesses, operating globally with offices in Amsterdam, London, Frankfurt, Warsaw and Bangalore.

   The role

   The role will be focused on backend development. You'll focus on delivering product features, developing backend APIs, data collection and ingestion services.

   The team

   Our tech team is based in Amsterdam, where most of us work 2 days a week onsite. We are a lean team of 10 senior engineers and 4 colleagues in Product and Design. Together we operate efficiently and pragmatically, where everyone's voice is heard. We are rapidly scaling so there's plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions. Apart from a short daily stand-up we keep meetings to a minimum. We do a monthly tech-team social event on Tuesday evenings that you are welcome to join.

   Your experience
     * > 5 years of software development
     * > 3 years Go
     * Deep Go knowledge, familiar with best practices and standards
     * Experienced using PostgreSQL or similar SQL databases
     * Experienced deploying Go applications on cloud platforms
     * API and SaaS backend web app development
     * Data scraping, aggregation, processing, and ingestion
       Bonus if you have
     * Experience with Google Cloud Platform
     * Experience with Infrastructure as Code tooling, such as Terraform or Pulumi
     * Experience with data pipelines and large-scale data aggregation
     * Experience in FinTech, economics, or private equity
     * An interest in GenAI (we have shipped multiple features and have many more in the pipeline)
       What we offer
     * Working with excellent colleagues on a product that is loved by its customers
     * Flexibility and freedom
     * Modern stack
     * Excellent compensation
     * Equipment of your choice
     * Company-wide outings and events
     * Well-funded company that is healthy and fast-growing
       Does this sound like a perfect match?
       Don't hesitate. Apply now or reach out to our Head of Engineering, . Let's explore the potential for a perfect match!
       B.V. with its registered seat in Apollolaan 151, 1077 AR Amsterdam, The Netherlands, or another entity which runs the recruitment process, further called "", is the controller of personal data you submit as part of the job application. Your personal data will be processed for the purpose of conducting a recruitment process for the job position you apply for. If you provide with explicit consent, your personal data will be also processed for the purpose of conducting future recruitment processes. Please read the Privacy Policy to acquaint yourself with how processes your personal data: .

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software development using Go and PostgreSQL, with a mention of cloud platforms and API development. While there is a bonus point for interest in GenAI and the company uses 'advanced AI tech', the core responsibilities and required experience do not align with the specific tasks and technologies of a GenAI Engineer or ML Engineer. The role is primarily traditional backend software engineering, making it fall under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not a dedicated AI/ML role.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states 'backend development', 'delivering product features', 'developing backend APIs', and 'API and SaaS backend web app development', which are core software development tasks.
The role requires building and maintaining APIs, a fundamental aspect of backend software development.

The role involves 'data collection and ingestion services', 'Data scraping, aggregation, processing, and ingestion', and potentially 'data pipelines and large-scale data aggregation', which are data engineering tasks.
This phrase directly relates to the handling and preparation of data for use.
job_tasks.phrase: Data scraping, aggregation, processing, and ingestion

job_tasks.justification: The requirement to deploy Go applications on cloud platforms and the bonus mention of 'Infrastructure as Code tooling' suggest involvement in operational aspects of software deployment.
job_tasks.phrase: deploying Go applications on cloud platforms

job_tasks.justification: The company's mission to 'provide global private market visibility' and serving specific industries like private equity and M&A indicates a need for understanding the business context.

soft_skills.phrase: plenty of room to have a big impact and set directions
